attributes.action: Minimum wage for young people is a joke £3.30 an hour for equal responsibility
attributes.additional_details: The government dictate are minimum wage and after tax we are left with the harsh reality that even working full time is as young people still can not provide ourselfs with independence financially something need to change,people need to start listening
attributes.background: For young people trying to change their life's living on this wage isn't enough.I believe society needs to take a moment to recognise that the work that us as young people do is equal to someone who is older than use and we should be payed equally.
